column5:
you will make your daughter miserable. i saw your comment about you and your daughters height and weight and you both certainly are extremely overweight. what in the hell is wrong with your daughter wanting to have a healthy diet and feel good and happy by exercising like most normal healthy people? your sister clearly loves your daughter and cares about her self image more than you do. just because you don‚Äôt like vegetables and exercising and you‚Äôre content with being overweight and happy does not mean your daughter is the same way. she wants to eat healthy, look and feel good, and is unhappy with being overweight. this is borderline abuse. 

YTA.
yta. i‚Äôm feeling secondhand embarrassment from your behavior‚Äîwhat is wrong with you.
seriously this is dumb
i‚Äôm loling imagining this
i noticed how odd that was too. almost sounds like she had a baby with someone other than OP... lol.
honestly i saw a difference after maybe like two days of using it but i think i ended up using it for a few weeks before it disappeared completely.
nta. also, hilarious.
god he‚Äôs such a dork loser
omg i was a fool for believing those pictures were somewhat realistic. i have learned nothing from this sub.

i have bpd. bpd or not that would make anyone feel unappreciated. i am pregnant with my first and my husband wrote me a nice card and made dinner. i didn‚Äôt even expect it but it was so nice and those are the kind of gestures that make me feel loved. it‚Äôs completely valid for you to feel unappreciated. god it‚Äôs so hard to ask to be cared for without feeling needy at the same time but i do encourage you to have a calm conversation with him about how his lack of care made you feel.

i might have to try this! at 15 and half weeks right now, i‚Äôve been eating at LEAST twice as much as i used to. Before finding out i was pregnant, i was hungry all the time with a huge appetite which is very unlike my normal self. i usually eat very little food due to having a low appetite. i started at 118 and 5‚Äô7‚Äù and now i am already 130. it‚Äôs terrifying! i had morning sickness only for about a full week or so and since then i‚Äôve been hungry as a hippo. it also really sucks that the gyms are closed not that i would go if it reopened at this point in the pandemic.
i would pour out a bit of acv on the cap/lid and dip a q-tip. then brush it on the eyelid. :) then dump out the dipped in acv to not contaminate the bottle somehow.
same- certain brands smallest size is sometimes still not flattering to me. i have learned to shop from certain brands for this reason.
also a sober mom to be here! pregnant at the moment i‚Äôve been sober for two years. sooo relieved i‚Äôm not going to be a miserable drunk of a mom!!
omg thank you. i hate how trendy it is to be an alcoholic and drink wine every night of your life...

NTA. 

absolutely not. me and my sister don‚Äôt wear our bras under our t-shirt‚Äôs at each other‚Äôs houses even if mine or her husband is home. 

i hate bras too. your uncle sounds ignorant and misogynistic. and as for your scars, f your aunt wow, i admire you for no longer harming yourself and not being ashamed of your past.

NTA. BUT two ppl don‚Äôt fall in love because it was ‚Äúmeant to be‚Äù, ‚Äúfate‚Äù or because someone is especially special. it‚Äôs about the process of making some special to you and each other. you two love each other. there was no malicious intent and she didn‚Äôt coerce you. you wouldn‚Äôt have fallen in love with her even if she tried all that if you didn‚Äôt/don‚Äôt find her loveable. 

i totally understand that you feel betrayed and kept in the dark but i think it‚Äôs a bit naive/melodramatic of you to take it that far and wonder if this is ‚Äúreal‚Äù. there is no such thing as a fairytale everything perfect coinkidink ‚Äúreal‚Äù love.
yes totally normal pregnancy lasted until 13 weeks or so for me.
i‚Äôm laughing wayyyyy too hard at this. thank you.
when i couldn‚Äôt stomach meat, i really enjoyed tofu.
wow that‚Äôs awesome! happy for you :)
i can‚Äôt get over how cute she is
hahahahah love this.

thank you ladies for your replies. 

yesterday i exercised for the second time since i‚Äôve been pregnant. i did mostly body weight workouts and used 8 pound dumbbells for step ups and bicep curls. i‚Äôm more nervous about doing too much because i had a miscarriage scare a few weeks back which contributed to me being sedentary (it was BV - caused me to bleed but i took antibiotics for that and am fine now). but i think that was a good light/moderate exercise. 

today i‚Äôve been more conscientious about eating healthier and avoiding junk foods. ate fruit and yogurt for breakfast and snacked on carrots and homemade ranch. 

i feel better. i think i just needed to realize that it‚Äôs time for me to look at my pregnancy as a marathon not a sprint. now is a good time to get into a good routine and eating habits now that i‚Äôm healthy and in my second trimester without weird food aversions and such. 

thank you again for all of your inputs!
i honestly think this is it. i just weighed myself and i‚Äôve gained sooo much weight. i went from 117 (5‚Äô7‚Äù) to 128 now at 14 weeks. i am SHOCKED.
irrelevant but you have incredible lashes!!
oh my god. rest in peace minnie.
wtf

thanks! yeah i really don‚Äôt know what it could be. the rash is subsiding for the most part at this point. so i would say it was a mild rash that lasted about 5 days or so.. started with an itchy lower belly. 

i would really hope we don‚Äôt have bedbugs but i‚Äôll definitely take a look. the rash also seems to be primarily around my belly, sides, and butt only. so weird.. 

i do have eczema and have previously had really awful heat rash/ sun poisoning regularly in the past. i‚Äôm also hotter than usual from being pregnant and i get night sweats every night from my antidepressants (approved by ob).

same. cringe

was on it for 10 months. actually lost weight. i struggle with having a very low appetite and lexapro didn‚Äôt make me eat any outrageous amount of food. ate a little more than i used to but i exercise regularly.

i‚Äôm happy for you. i remember your post from a while ago. my husband finished his three week detox/rehab and is returning this sunday. hopeful and an anxious wreck all at the same time. i‚Äôm also pregnant so.. 
also i remember you saying we had similar situations leading up to the detox and i just realized we are also around the same age as well. just wanted to let you know please feel free to reach out to me if you ever need someone to talk to. :)
no tapering. was on 15mg for 10 months. straight to 50mg zoloft. but like i said, i‚Äôm breaking the 50 in half.

it‚Äôs honestly going alright. i decided to break the 50mg in half because i felt pretty nauseous coming off lexapro and starting zoloft. so i‚Äôve been taking 25 i think today is the fifth day. 

i feel a lot better today than i have the past few days. classic depression and fatigue. hard to say however because i‚Äôm also pregnant. 

i will say i feel like my sleep has improved. my sleep was shit on lexapro. so i hope this continues.
what a gd BRAT.

yes i felt similar. felt faded. exhausted and depressed. i just switched to zoloft after ten months however because the night sweats were driving me insane and it never got any better only worse. praying for some kind of a miracle that zoloft won‚Äôt cause night sweats for me i‚Äôm not very hopeful though.
my husband and i tuck each other in on a regular basis and i can confirm it‚Äôs one of the best feelings ever.

why did you have those pills just lying there? this is a genuine question not a jab. this honestly fucks me up as a wife of an recovering addict whose just been released from his fifth inpatient rehab.

edit: scrolled down and read why they were in the medicine cabinet. this is why being honest with your friends and family is so essential to maintaining sobriety. like others have said i strongly encourage you tell them the truth and ask that they be conscientious of the risks and temptations you may have.
bet you don‚Äôt get laid
why are you so bothered by it is the real question.
hahaha i same!!! i‚Äôm way too old for ed though at 26.

i was on lex for ten months and had severe night sweats for the entire time and i‚Äôm so fed up with it at this point so i‚Äôm feeling more paranoid than i am hopeful. thank you for the encouragement. hope zoloft helps you. i know a lot of people for whom zoloft has been lifesaving.

wow thank you. he‚Äôs a even bigger coward pos than i originally presumed from reading the comments. 

OP you‚Äôre a rapist and a coward. no one feels bad for your feeling guilty and claiming you‚Äôre gonna commit suicide IF you end up facing prison time. 

i have a feeling even if she brushed it off and considered it okay at the time, it may have come back to haunt her later anyway. i‚Äôve had a similar experience where i was confused at the time whether it was rape or not because i was interested in that person. but looking back it was rape as clear as day and i now think of that man as a disgusting rapist. men who take advantage of women while they‚Äôre asleep and unconscious are predators.  

like another commenter has said, if you‚Äôre ever looking to ask for forgiveness and even begin to think about moving on from your heinous past, you‚Äôre gonna have to learn how to accept what it is you did wrong and face the consequences of your actions. you don‚Äôt seem like you‚Äôve changed a bit.

hello!!! ahh thank you for sharing! i went from 15mg of lexapro to 50mg of zoloft straight away as well. 

my biggest concern is experiencing the same side effects as i did with lexapro. that was a big motivation behind switching for me. 

probably a bit premature to ask since you‚Äôre only on day 10 but i‚Äôm wondering what side effects i‚Äôll end up with permanently. most side effects of lexapro went for me besides shitty sleep anxiety dreams and night sweats..

yeah i mean i tried EVERYTHING to try and get rid of it including the excision. i tried antibiotics, castor oil, warm compress, activated charcoal, you name it. 

the day i started putting acv on it, it started diminishing right away. now when i feel like my eye (the affected eye) is dry and sore i put some acv on my eyelids as a preventative measure. 

glad to hear acv came through for your warts!

oh okay. so i‚Äôve been wanting a new bottle and as soon as shelter in place is over i‚Äôm planning on going to nordstrom to get a few samples of different fragrances instead of buying another bottle of philosykos. i‚Äôll definitely smell that one and maybe get a sample as well.

tam dao is so cool. i couldn‚Äôt quite make the commitment to it however. i felt like i wasn‚Äôt cool enough to pull it off üòÖ i did take a sample and wore it until it was gone. love love.

also love l‚Äôombre dans leau.
i recently smelled rose n roses by miss dior thought it was quite lovely.
love diptyque! personal favorite are philosykos and l'ombre dans l'eau
it‚Äôs just wonderful. i highly recommend diptyque in general but especially philosykos. nothing like it in my opinion.

parfum! even the parfum i noticed the fragrance doesn‚Äôt last quite as well as other perfumes i have used. so i would highly recommend going with the parfum as oppose to toilette. 

it is truly divine. the perfectly sweet woody smell.

hmm let me have a go at this. i usually go through phases. but i what i currently am into are the following: 

snack veggies i will with hummus or ranch :

carrots, celery, cucumber, baby tomatoes (have you ever tried the kumato ones?! they‚Äôre amazing)

fruit: 

organic strawberries only because they really do taste so much better, ambrosia apples, cosmic crisp apples, organic bananas (again they really do taste so much better and i am a fruit snob), korean pears 

veggies to cook with: 

serrano peppers, water chestnut, zucchini, baby cauliflowers, asparagus, cabbage, onion, garlic, mustard greens, collard greens, cilantro, lime

meat: whatever i‚Äôm in the mood for

and to be completely honest i also buy some more junk food type snacks like chicken chips or coconut chips and etc. 

i tend to be lenient with snacks because i general eat pretty healthy. i hope some of my items give you an idea for what you get on your next trip to the grocery store!

ooh and i forgot to mention i love eating my apples sliced with plain whole milk yogurt (healthiest kind you can find with not a lot of sugar) and on that most i love making banana shakes with oat milk and misutgaru which is a ground powder of roasted grains and seeds so like a protein powder but organic. 

sometimes i buy rotisserie chicken and take it apart at home to use for chicken noodle soup or salad as well.
it‚Äôs a live in nanny. actually what a great suggestion! usually paid low but the family would provide you with a room and i think they feed you as well.
it‚Äôs actually chalazion but yeah i know it reminds me of charmander lol

yeah so my husband is a recovering addict and he has a lot of pains whether it‚Äôs physical or chemical. he used to complain about his shoulder, back, hip, and ankle on a daily basis and all of that has disappeared with cymbalta along with his depression and anxiety. it‚Äôs kind of nuts. not the experience for everyone however. effects vary depending on the individual as pretty much any meds do.

absolutely! thank you for welcoming me to DM you. i‚Äôm so over the night sweats. lexapro did decent with my depression at 15mg but that‚Äôs when the night sweats got out of hand. waking up soaked head to toe multiple times throughout the night. and it also didn‚Äôt do much to help with my ocd and anxiety. i don‚Äôt have too much of a high hope for zoloft as i know they‚Äôre quite similar. but i‚Äôm giving this ssri one more try before i take my chance at snri‚Äôs. 

will definitely let you know if i see any interesting changes on zoloft as well. thanks for sharing.

you too! man what a struggle it is to find that perfect mix of drugs. i‚Äôm pregnant right now and staying on zoloft is the safest option for me so until i‚Äôm done with the pregnancy i‚Äôve got no choice but to stay on. but if zoloft doesn‚Äôt do it for me, i‚Äôm gonna try cymbalta (an snri) next. i‚Äôve heard some hopeful testimonials of people who‚Äôve tried both lexapro as well as zoloft doing much better on cymbalta. and my husband who has tried a list of ssris including zoloft is now on cymbalta and it has saved his life (from depression and anxiety) with no adverse side effects. thanks for sharing! good luck.

hello!!!! i just want to say i feel your pain. i‚Äôm looking into giving up on ssri‚Äôs completely after being on lexapro and now starting zoloft. lexapro gave me SEVERE night sweats the entire ten months of me being on it. i‚Äôm afraid zoloft will be the same for me as they‚Äôre quite similar. 

my husband is on cymbalta and it has been a life saver for him with no side effects.

ok so i switched from lexapro to zoloft because of the night sweats. wake up at least two or three times a night soaked from head to toe in my own sweat. i was in lexapro for ten months and i had it the entire time. man i‚Äôm thinking i may need to switch to snri‚Äôs and stay away from ssri‚Äôs completely. i cannot STAND the night sweats any more. it‚Äôs impossible to deal with for me.

waittttt. i just switched from lexapro to zoloft as well for me lexapro was giving me the worst night sweats ever. after ten months of having shitty sleep and soaking my sheets, i decided to switch. 

went from 15mg of lexapro to 50mg of zoloft straight away. feeling pretty nauseous rn.

ok sooo i had one that lasted over a year.. i eventually went to a doctor to get it excised. that hurt like a MOFO. but it didn‚Äôt make it go away completely and it started accumulating again. i tried EVERYTHING. nothing worked except applying apple cider vinegar on it. it stings bad but it made it disappear completely and i haven‚Äôt had one in years now. and no i‚Äôm not an anti vaxxer or an essential oil user lol. just hoping maybe i could help! good luck.

i‚Äôve gotten one too that lasted over a year!! mine wouldn‚Äôt have been able to squeezed out thru the tear duct like that however. i had a surgery to cut it open and scrape the buildup out. that didn‚Äôt even get rid of it completely. this sound absolutely BIZARRE but the only thing that made mine go away and not come back was applying apple cider vinegar on it... (i‚Äôm not an anti vaxxer and i don‚Äôt use essential oils lmao)

I am so happy and relieved for you. I did the same after my husband relapsed after he kept up being sober for a year and a half then drank and used for 10 months. He denied help for all of those 10 months until our marriage was in shambles and I was repeatedly kicking him out of the house and his alcohol and drug abuse just spiraled more and more. He's been in detox and now in treatment since 8 days ago. I have been relieved of worries that he might be dead, the mental/verbal/emotional abuse, and constant negativity. I miss him a lot. I feel empty and sad. But like you, I've learned to reach out to my loved ones and come clean about the whole situation (easier now that he's taken action steps to recovery). I am happy for you and proud of you for taking this much needed time to care for yourself. Thank you for sharing.
makes sense. thanks.

Not only that, I wake up at least 2-3 times completely soaked in my own sweat from head to TOE every single night since ive been on it and i am sick of it. I can't anymore of this shit. I was thinking about talking to my doctor about Zoloft. 

Thank you for sharing your experience. This truly gives me hope that  maybe I won't spiral into a massive depression either..
